solution_line_template: After the first {first_leg} miles, he rowed {second_leg} miles more, reaching {first_leg}+{second_leg} = <<{first_leg}+{second_leg}={after_second_leg}>>{after_second_leg} miles.
After resting, he adds {third_leg} miles more, which is {third_leg}+{after_second_leg} = <<{third_leg}+{after_second_leg}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} miles
